title: APG Actions Menu Button Example Using aria-activedescendant
description: This example demonstrates how the menu button design pattern can be used to create a button that opens an actions menu. Note: not all features present in this example are tested, as they are tested elsewhere in this project.

chrome.notes: tab to the button with it collapsed
tab to the button with it expanded
tab to the button with it expanded, then execute this command
activate the menu button, and focus will be sent to the target (menu)
chrome.output: "menu, Actions menu, Action 1, 1 of 4, To move through items press up or down arrow."

chrome.notes: press up and down arrows to navigate menu items
